summary: I am an experienced, engaging and dynamic leader seeking an opportunity for growth within CCISD's Student Personnel Services Department. I consistently demonstrate effective communication, public relations, and interpersonal skills, with a focus on positive, customer-service-driven interactions with all students, parents, faculty/staff, and community stakeholders. I possess excellent organizational skills as well as the ability to maintain emotional control under stress and to work with frequent interruptions.

experience.title: Coordinator of Student Personnel Services
experience.description: Leads the campus counseling team and program development within CCISD's Student Personnel Services; coordinates campus registration events, program implementation and evaluation; provides crisis management; ensures timely access to community health and human services; oversees advising for academic and college/career planning; supervises staff and manages the department budget.

experience.title: Lead Counselor/Director of College Counseling
experience.description: Led the campus counseling team to plan, implement, and evaluate programs; provided proactive personal and group counseling, crisis management, and guidance for high school and post-secondary planning; coordinated college and career information programs.

experience.title: Counselor
experience.description: Provided counseling services for Grades 9-12; supported student growth and post-secondary planning; collaborated with teachers, administrators, parents and community partners.

experience.title: English Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Taught Grade 7 English Language Arts; served as 7th grade team lead; developed and facilitated lessons; evaluated assignments; accommodated or modified instruction for students with special services.

experience.title: English Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Taught Grades 9-12 ELA at an alternative high school; TAAS coordinator for February test dates; developed lessons and assessments; conferred with students and parents.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Office manager; provided customer service for clients; maintained correspondence with four law firms; filed legal documents; generated monthly billing statements; prepared various legal documents.

experience.title: English Language Arts Teacher
experience.description: Taught ELA at a traditional high school; developed and facilitated lessons; evaluated assignments; accommodated or modified instruction; conferred with students and parents.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in English and History

certifications: Certified in School Counseling (EC-12) by the Texas State Board for Educator Certification
Certified in English and History (6-12) by the Texas State Board for Educator Certification
